name: Fate of Another
description:
My entry for the 2020, "You Got It, Now Use It" Game Jam hosted by Studio Blue.

You play as Stephen who vowed to clear out Castle Lunar after it had fallen to a swam of beasts. However, the very moment he sets foot inside the castle things change.

WARNING: This game contains frequent screen flashes. If you are sensitive to these, please don't play this game.
